amendment.description: To ensure that the reserve fund relating to affordable healthcare choices for all is used to repeal and not further empower the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 749 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 749 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Lee. (consideration: CR S1979-1980; text: CR S1979) To ensure that the reserve fund relating to affordable healthcare choices for all is used to repeal and not further empower the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 749 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Lee.
